ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Help needed from players of ALL servers!
ygData.msgSnippet: Plus those from UO (also like 100+), we can easily rock the server. ;) To start the ball rolling, I wonder any local game site where we can put up a list of
ygData.messageBody:
Plus those from UO (also like 100+), we can easily rock the server. ;)

To start the ball rolling, I wonder any local game site where we can put up
a list of local online RPGers with RL name, email, ICQ, online RPG games
played & duration etc, as well as a msg board for us to keep in contact.
Any game site admin here, say from HTGK, PI site, Singurity etc?

The price for UO acct is going down, think I gotta sell my ASAP b4 UO2
released, hehe. EQ? D2? ;P

On Tuesday, 12 September, 2000 10:37 AM, kctan@...
[SMTP:kctan@...] wrote:
>
>
>
> Hiya, just helping someone to post on the mailing list.
>
> ~Damuo, a monk without a god~
